name: 'Serial' Killer
description:
Story:

You're a local detective who has figured out the location of the dreaded ‘Serial’ killer; a dangerous individual who is known for leaving serial numbers upon his victims. The killer is also known to always take something from the scene of the crime in order to remember his kills. Those items are crucial evidence and are needed to form a case and arrest the psychopath. 

It is your job to gather all the pieces of evidence, before the ‘Serial’ killer claims another victim (That’s YOU!) Search carefully for 5 clues and attempt to escape the killer’s lair before it’s too late…

Controls:

Use 'WASD' keys to move. You can interact with other objects/beings by moving towards them.

Credits:

Game Design: Dalton Hyde & Edward Tavarez 

Code:  Manuel Govea & Tony Giumenta

Music: Manuel Govea

Story & Art: Jean Paul Salman
